title: E5373s-155’s signal is weak and cannot register to 4G network
answer:
A: 

 1.       Please check local network condition, check whether there is 4G network which provided by telecom operator at the moment. Ensure you are not in some close environment. (You may check the signal strengthen by the icon  displayed on Web UI main page)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39178) 

 2. Please move E5373s-155 toward to window to get better signal 

 3. If the network condition is good but still cannot register, please try to reset E5373s-155 and try again 

 4. Sometimes E5373s-155 will be rejected by the operator for some reasons. Please reset E5373s-155 and check. If E5373s-155 still cannot camp on the network, please contact with your device provider. 

 5. Login Web UI to check whether E5373s-155 has been set to 3G or 2G only mode. If your E5373s-155 has been set to 2G or 3G only, please select the 4G only option or Auto in the drop down menu.![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39179)
